Reviews.Title: wolvol  laptop
Reviews.Author: dodid
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best laptops i have ever had. It has lots of free apps and is very speedy.  I would not hesitate to recommend the wolvol to anyone. Thank You

Reviews.Title: Great little machine, and excellent service.
Reviews.Author: Linda Steward
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the WolVol computer I bought.  It is the perfect combination of the useful features of both a laptop and an android device. You can do  word processing yet use apps. Connects on  wifi , hard wired or phone-type internet service. It has two usb plug-ins so can take a memory stick, and an HDMI plug so you can watch things on your TV.  It has a real keyboard and it even comes with a mouse! If you're used to Windows, the android system  takes a little getting used to, but just play around with it and  it's not hard to figure out. I bought this as a gift for a friend with limited computer knowledge and I think it will be perfect for her.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!!!
Reviews.Author: Shellie Lynn  Miller
Reviews.Content: Small, compact, everything you need for a laptop!!! Great replacement for my full size laptop. Cant wait to take it on vacation.

Reviews.Title: Its works bigger than it is.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Its everything it was advertised for. Its really a fine machine. But I yearn for a more complete instruction manual, like for the Kings office, etc. And the camera needs work, not that great.

Reviews.Title: Very Happy With WolVol
Reviews.Author: J McD
Reviews.Content: I was a little sceptical at first, considering it was "the smallest laptop"  but I was pleasently suprised.  It is actually a christmas present, so I have not messed with it a whole lot.  I just opend it charged it to make sure it was in working condition and it all seems well.  Thanks wolvol

Reviews.Title: does not work
Reviews.Author: Debra R. Capansky
Reviews.Content: I bought 2 f these for Christmas gifts for my granddaughters.  The black one never would connect to the Internet and the red one only connects when and if it wants to. we have even had them looked at by other people and they can not get them to connect either.

Reviews.Title: Bought in December, died in March
Reviews.Author: Melissa A Davis
Reviews.Content: I bought this to use like a tablet with a keyboard (for writing and editing) and quickly noticed that some punctuation keys are laid out differently than a normal keyboard.  It was kind of a pain to get around that, and slowed my typing considerably.  Strike one.  I then noticed that it was often slow to respond, and sometimes (more often than it should have) shut down on a whim.  Strike two.  I then had it plugged in to charge, and heard this fizz-pop sound, and a slight burnt plastic smell.  It overheated, and apparently fried the thing.  It hasn't worked since (screen will light up when turned on, but will not go to any welcome screen and then shuts off).  Strike three.  Game over.Do not purchase this.  It is not worth a dime, much less the price they're charging.  This is an example of an off-brand that just doesn't measure up.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy!
Reviews.Author: StoneTotem
Reviews.Content: I got this and had to return the 1st one cause it wouldnt turn on...Had to pay return shipping and got the new one a week later the new one doesnt turn on or do anything....Do not waste your time...

Reviews.Title: Poor Screen Quality
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Eclectic Artist"
Reviews.Content: This laptop was just what I was looking for, it is small, light weight, and runs the Android operating system, so it will sync with my existing tablet and phone. Unfortunately, the screen is so fuzzy that I am sending it back. This might be okay for a child who has never used a computer before, but my children were disappointed with lack of clarity on the screen.

ProductInfo.Features:
7-inch Slim Light Weight Trendy Mini Laptop RED.
Built-in WiFi and Ethernet Port to Access the Internet
Pre-Installed with ToonGoggles Cartoon Videos, NETFLIX, YouTube, Facebook, Twitter and Writing applications
Installed with 2 USB Ports, SD Card Slot, HDMI Port and a built in Camera
Battery 3200mAh. Standby Time:6HRS / Work Time:2-3HRS
ProductInfo.Name: WolVol Worlds Smallest Internet Laptop (Works with WIFI or Ethernet cable) - RED
